name: blood-boil
contents:
---
class: Thaumaturgist
name: Blood Boil
school: Blood
---

Flavor text.

Uses:
- Blood Boil: at-will, std, touch or ranged (if you are touching their blood); subject suffers medium internal fire damage, plus same on turn start (Con ends).
